item.title: Wormhole Cryptocurrency Platform Hit by $321 Million Cyberattack
item.description: Yesterday, attackers leveraged a vulnerability in the Wormhole cryptocurrency platform and stole approximately $321 million in wETH (wrapped Ethereum).
item.content:encoded: Yesterday, attackers leveraged a vulnerability in the Wormhole cryptocurrency platform and stole approximately $321 million in wETH (wrapped Ethereum).
